explains: v. 透露，公开；揭开，使显露

sentences.en: Neither side would disclose details of the transaction.
sentences.cn: 双方都不会透露交易的细节。

sentences.en: I am afraid we are not at liberty to disclose that information.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我们无权透露那信息。

sentences.en: The spokesman refused to disclose details of the takeover to the press.
sentences.cn: 发言人拒绝向新闻界透露公司收购的详细情况。
